description:
This durable and convertible front-entry PFD keeps you protected wherever you are. With the changeable inflator cap from the hip pocket, you can go from manual to automatic inflation giving you the versatility for any situation.

  • Highly durable and supple 500D Cordura® nylon for long-lasting safety
  • 28lbs of buoyancy when inflated and a 1-fold design for re-packing, it will give you peace of mind on the water
  • Inspect the inflator easily through the window and safety checks are a breeze with the access flap
  • Re-Arm Kit L available (sold separately)
name: Mustang Survival MIT 100 Convertible A/M Inflatable PFD - Unisex
